actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Recreation and Public Purposes Act of 1926, as amended, to provide for the sale or transfer of public lands to State and local governments for public purposes.

summary.text: Provides, under the Recreation and Public Purposes Act of 1926, as amended, for the sale or transfer of public lands to State and local governments for public recreation purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Recreation and Public Purposes Act of 1926, as amended, to provide for the sale or transfer of public lands to State and local governments for public purposes.
